questions.prompt: What is the output of console.log(typeof null) in JavaScript?
questions.explanation: This is a historical JavaScript quirk: typeof null returns 'object'.

questions.prompt: Which data structure gives average O(1) lookup in most hash table implementations?
questions.explanation: Hash maps provide average constant-time lookup.

questions.prompt: In binary search on a sorted array of n elements, worst-case time complexity is:
questions.explanation: Binary search halves the search space each step.

questions.prompt: Which SQL clause is used to filter groups after aggregation?
questions.explanation: HAVING filters grouped records after aggregation.

questions.prompt: What does HTTP status code 404 mean?
questions.explanation: 404 indicates the requested resource was not found.
